H0.text: Carrying a microscope with both hands is part of its proper use and care.

H1.text: Reflecting sunlight to the stage is a proper use and care of a microscope.

H2.text: Removing the objectives after you are done is part of proper use and care of a microscope.

H3.text: Adjusting the coarse focus under high power is included in proper use and care of a microscope.
